title: I can't buy Taliyah
body:
I can't buy her.

I've already updated the game, but when I go to the shop, she's not there. Also when I go to her champion page to buy her, it says she's not available, why's that?

replies.body:
While she is currently available now, I wanted to mention that new champions are usually never released the moment the patch drops.  Sometimes the latest and newest champion isn't made available until a couple of days after the patch. 

Hopefully this resolves any confusion!  Let me know if anyone still can't see her!
Just out of curiosity. How come new champions can't be released the moment of the patch? Is there a specific reason for it?

Essentially, we want to make sure that everything with the patch is going smoothly.  Once we drop it, we monitor the platform and servers for a bit, and check to see if everything is looking good.  If so, we then release the champion!

I set so many alarms to make sure I'd be awake to buy Taliyah for myself and all my friends before they could buy it for themselves. Dropped 100$ on RP just for the occasion, only to have her be indefinitely unavailable.

I don't think I've been let down this hard since I pre-ordered SWTOR. :(

yea me to is unavailable. And i really want her.
Well for those three, the skins don't show up until a few days into each new patch. Any and all skins(that aren't a champion release skin) do so.

i've been waiting for the past 3 hours, had a game that got interrupted by the patch (i'm cool with that, i know how it goes, not really that big of a deal) but i have been waiting to literally THROW money at you Rito for this champ. What's the deal.

oh, also, same probs.
Seriously, guys? The skins and new champ are never released day one... Get with the program...

New champions are generally not released until a few days into the patch.  They usually ensure patch stability first before making new champs and skins available.  Considering I and some other players are not able to connect to games this patch, there's clearly a stability issue they need to focus on fixing.

I'm sick of riot's bs. This is an everyday thing at this point. I had to refresh my entire operating system because the patcher became corrupted mid patch. I'll give riot the benefit of the doubt and say that it wasn't their fault even though that's the first time that has happened to me, but then after hours of fixing that mess, I finally log in to find that I can't even purchase the new champion I've been saving IP for. Even if she becomes available within 30 minutes of now, it's the constant inconsistency that has been plaguing this game for a while now that's making me seriously considering uninstalling. Server crashes mid 6.9 patch, dynamic queue is an all around cancerous experience, and now this garbage. Fix your game Riot, you're running it into the ground.

I hope she becomes available soon cause like in the next 30 mins or so I have to leave to drive my sis home who unfortunately lives a couple states away... and I have to bring her back so I'm stuck there till Sunday. They don't have internet either, apparently they're "just outside the city" and that makes them ineligible for service.
